Text: OPM Hours Survey May Cc Jpst Its that time again to enter your hours and activities for May Please go to the following path OEnergyOpsOPM Hours SurveyProdUser use ProdUser if you have not converted to Windows in Access to access the hours survey Do not attempt to access the database links sent to you in the past because the file names have been changed and the link will not work Please have your survey completed by Tuesday June Please call me if you have any questions or need me to help you complete the survey Thanks Roxanne x

OPM Hours Survey May Cc Jpst This is just a friendly reminder that the Hours Survey is due today Please feel free to give me a call with any questions or if you need me to help you complete the survey Thanks Roxanne x

RE OPM Hours Survey May Cc Jpst If anyone is currently in the hours database please close out of Access completely It has been corrupted and it needs to be replaced I will let you know when this has been completed Thanks Roxanne

RE OPM Hours Survey May Cc Jpst You may now access the Hours database Thanks Roxanne Original Message From Saldana Roxanne Sent Wednesday June AM To Saldana Roxanne Eiben Michael Cook Diane H Giron Darron C Love Phillip M Keiser Kam Saladino Jane S McLaughlin Jr Errol Wynne Rita White Stacey Murphy Melissa Ann Ratnala Melissa K Allen Thresa A Farmer Daren J Baumbach David Flynn Irene Moorer Torrey Abel Chris Dudley Cheryl Lombardi Kelly Lambert Karen Valdes John Hunter Larry Joe Thorne Mark D Bryan Linda S Ayala Susie Boals Adrial Carrizales Blanca Miroballi Angelo Coleman Tandra Cc Gossett Jeffrey C Baxter Bryce Kelly Katherine L Theriot Kim Thomas Sheri Gilley Carolyn Superty Robert Olinger Kimberly S Bussell l Kathryn Snow Karen Terry Edward Wilson Shona Greif Donna Smith George Lamadrid Victor Kelly Katherine L Scribner James Nicholie Suzanne Subject RE OPM Hours Survey May If anyone is currently in the hours database please close out of Access completely It has been corrupted and it needs to be replaced I will let you know when this has been completed Thanks Roxanne

FW OPM Hours Survey July Cc I noticed you both attributed hours to the ES Activity in the hours survey The system might not have prompted you to split out by percentages the commercial teams you supported perfoming that activity because I dont see it out there Will you please let know which commercial team you supported and the percentage it looks like Tom Martin put to Asset Trading but Im not sure if it would be the same for the both of you Thanks Roxanne

RE OPM Hours Survey USE ACCESS PLEASE Cc reviewed the exception reports and no one entered the headcount for their cost center in the survey Please go into the second button named Please Enter Number of People for Each Position and enter your headcount by position This information gets rolled over each month except when we begin a new quarter and we require that you enter your FTEs into a blank database Thanks Roxanne x Original Message From Saldana Roxanne Sent Wednesday May PM To Eiben Michael Cook Diane H Giron Darron Love Phillip Keiser Kam Saladino Jane McLaughlin Errol Wynne Rita White Stacey Murphy Melissa Ann Allen Thresa Ratnala Melissa Farmer Daren J Baumbach David Flynn Irene Moorer Torrey Abel Chris Dudley Cheryl Lombardi Kelly Lambert Karen Valdes John Hunter Larry Joe Thorne Mark D Bryan Linda Hare Bill Forster Avril Ayala Susie Boals Adrial Carrizales Blanca Miroballi Angelo Thompson Patti Cc Gossett Jeffrey Baxter Bryce Kelly Katherine L Theriot Kim Thomas Sheri Gilley Carolyn Superty Robert Olinger Kimberly S Bussell l Kathryn Snow Karen Terry Edward Thompson Patti Wilson Shona Greif Donna Smith George Lamadrid Victor Kelly Katherine L Kelly William Scribner James Subject FW OPM Hours Survey USE ACCESS PLEASE Its that time again to enter your hours and activities for April Please use the shortcut below or go to the following path OEnergyOpsOPM Hours SurveyProdUser to access the hours survey For those of you who have converted to Windows please DO NOT convert the database when you open it as everyone has not converted to Windows yet If you do not convert you can still enter your hours into the survey Since we are beginning a new quarter we have cleared all FTEs in the hours survey so please make sure to complete the FTEs section of the survey this month You can enter your FTEs using the second button on the main menu of the survey When completing the FTEs section of the survey if there are any Director this includes Sr Directors Sr Admin or Admin positions in your cost center please complete accordingly You are not expected to complete a hours survey for these positions but we do need them to be included in your FTEs Please have your survey completed by Monday May Please call me if you have any questions or need me to help you complete the survey Thanks Roxanne X OLE Object Package File Cost Center Quick Reference xls
